news_header: Domestic energy prices expected to rise by 5% from April.
news_original_title: Energy bills forecast to rise by £85 a year
news_text: Domestic energy prices are forecast to rise by 5% from April, adding £85 to household bills. The price cap will increase, affecting 26 million households. Energy Secretary Ed Miliband urged Ofgem to act quickly to protect consumers amid rising costs and debt. Experts suggest energy-saving measures.
